entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of snow. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow late this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog at times overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow mixed with freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow mixed with freezing rain beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Fog at times in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
